title: Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)
descriptions:
**Title:**
Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)

**Description:**
Dive into the enchanting world of Barbie Land with "Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)"—where every day is filled with magic and adventures. Imagine living in a world of perfection, only to face a unique twist in the form of an existential crisis or the challenge of being a Ken. This groundbreaking film offers a fresh look at the iconic Barbie story, blending humor, heart, and a touch of the unexpected.

**Experience the Extraordinary:**
- **It’s a Weird World:** Explore the quirky and whimsical aspects of Barbie Land that challenge the status quo.
- **All-Star Barbie Party:** Join in the fun at this star-studded event celebrating all things Barbie.
- **Musical Make-Believe:** Sing and dance your way through this musical journey filled with memorable tunes and catchy choruses.
- **Becoming Barbie:** Discover the journey of transformation and self-discovery in this special feature.
- **Welcome to Barbie Land:** A guided tour of the enchanting world where every corner holds a story.
- **Playing Dress-Up:** An extended look at the stunning costumes of Barbie and her friends, perfect for inspiring your own fashion adventures.

Perfect for fans of all ages, "Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)" is more than just a movie—it’s an invitation to experience a world where dreams come to life. Unlock the magic of Barbie Land today!

**Available Now: Blu-Ray + Digital**
